params.text:
Optional parameters

Optional parameters would be nice to have, but we can already simulate
them via function overloading over arity and tail calls:

    (let fn (a b c) ...)
    (let fn_with_default_c (a b) (tailcall fn a b 42))

The syntax sugar could look like this:

    (let fn (a b (c 42)) ...)

Here, c would be an optional positional parameter. Optional vs
positional or labeled would be orthogonal: a parameter could be optional
positional or optional labeled.
